name: Water of Life
description:
An action-adventure game prototype, that was developed using dasbox and dascript, for Gaijin Jam 2. Hopefully it will come out as a sort of hybrid between 2d legend of zelda games and dark souls-likes. In retrospective I should've limited game's scope to something more manageable for a 30 day jam, oh well.

Source (very badly written I must admit) can be found at https://github.com/DeadDie44/Water-Of-Life

Free assets used in this project :

Tile set, trees and bushes

https://cainos.itch.io/pixel-art-top-down-basic
